Frequency once per day
Requirements You are wielding a piercing or slashing weapon

You apply your tail's venom to a piercing or slashing weapon. If your next @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Strike]{Strike} with that weapon before the end of your next turn hits and deals damage, you deal @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Poison Damage} equal to your level to the target.
